body: TheRomanTrident just forced me to---- i mean... he has introduced me to the forums, after getting me into avicus. I have to be a member now, so what exactly are the standards of a "member?"
body_tagged: TheRomanTrident just forced me to---- i mean... he has introduced me to the forums, after getting me into avicus. I have to be a member now, so what exactly are the standards of a "member?"
title: Hello, i just joined the forums.

replies.body: Welcome to the forums! Just try to use appropriate language, don't advertise, and don't start flame wars or anything, and people will respect you. There's not really any standards besides that :D
replies.body_tagged: Welcome to the forums! Just try to use appropriate language, don't advertise, and don't start flame wars or anything, and people will respect you. There's not really any standards besides that :D

replies.body:
Welcome to the server! Listen to what JK said and don't go to the "Avicus is dying" posts. They're very spammy. 

Besides that, try to enjoy yourself.
replies.body_tagged:
Welcome to the server! Listen to what JK said and don't go to the "Avicus is dying" posts. They're very spammy. 

Besides that, try to enjoy yourself.

replies.body: Welcome to the Forums Of Avicus! Respect the rules, and don't start any Flame Wars, or say anything Inappropriate as JK Said. Hope you enjoy the forums!
replies.body_tagged: Welcome to the Forums Of Avicus! Respect the rules, and don't start any Flame Wars, or say anything Inappropriate as JK Said. Hope you enjoy the forums!

replies.body:
Hey there! (: 

Welcome to the Avicus Community! ;D If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact any Staff Member, as we will help ya out! ^~^

The Standards of a Member is just basic activity on the forums and Ingame ^,^ Follow all the rules, and you will be all good! :D
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Welcome to the server, Avicus!
Really, it's mostly common sense, and if you have questions/concerns/issues regarding anything about Avicus, anyone such as a staff member would gladly help and/or an experienced helpful member! :D

replies.body:
Hey man glad to see more new people! And to be honest you're in for an awesome community :)
There's fights, fun, humour, and neutral posts about virtually everything, from school and Avicus, to YouTubers and Favourite foods :)
Anyway enjoy and i hope to see you around :) - OPTOBAT
